statements: SELECT * FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT author_name FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, author_name FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, author_name FROM citations_and_references ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob');
SELECT id, publication_date FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT publication_date, COUNT(*) FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY publication_date;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT author_name, MAX(publication_date) FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT AVG(id), MIN(publication_date) FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT * FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%' AND publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2019-12-31';
SELECT MAX(publication_date) AS latest_publication_date FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT DISTINCT author_name FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT publication_date, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY publication_date;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY author_name, publication_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, MAX(id) AS max_id, MIN(id) AS min_id FROM citations_and_references;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob') GROUP BY author_name, publication_date;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references LIMIT 10;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date <= '2015-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date >= '2018-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC OFFSET 10 LIMIT 5;
SELECT author_name, AVG(id) AS average_id FROM citations_and_references GROUP BY author_name HAVING AVG(id) > 100;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations_and_references WHERE citation_text LIKE '%research%' GROUP BY author_name, publication_date;
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date = (SELECT MAX(publication_date) FROM citations_and_references);
SELECT author_name, publication_date, citation_text FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date = (SELECT MIN(publication_date) FROM citations_and_references);
SELECT author_name, publication_date, AVG(id) AS average_id FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name = 'John Doe' GROUP BY author_name, publication_date ORDER BY publication_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM citations LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations WHERE citation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM references WHERE reference_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT paper_id, reference_text FROM references ORDER BY reference_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations WHERE paper_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations WHERE citation_date < '2021-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT paper_id FROM citations;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM references;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE id = 456;
SELECT id, citation_date FROM citations WHERE paper_id = 789 ORDER BY citation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM references WHERE reference_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT paper_id FROM references WHERE reference_date > '2020-12-31';
SELECT id, reference_text FROM references WHERE reference_date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_text = 'example citation';
SELECT id, citation_date FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%data%';
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_date = '2021-10-20';
SELECT id, reference_date FROM references WHERE paper_id = 456 ORDER BY reference_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_date < '2021-05-01' AND paper_id = 789;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations WHERE paper_id IN (123, 456);
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE paper_id = 100;
SELECT citation_text FROM citations WHERE citation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM citations INNER JOIN references ON citations.paper_id = references.paper_id;
SELECT citations.id, citations.citation_date, references.reference_date FROM citations LEFT JOIN references ON citations.paper_id = references.paper_id;
SELECT MAX(citations.citation_date) AS latest_citation_date FROM citations;
SELECT AVG(citations.id) AS avg_citation_id FROM citations GROUP BY citations.paper_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT citations.paper_id) AS unique_paper_count FROM citations;
SELECT citations.citation_text AS citation, references.reference_text AS reference FROM citations CROSS JOIN references WHERE citations.id = 1 AND references.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%good%' AND citation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT citations.id, citations.citation_text FROM citations WHERE citations.id IN (SELECT id FROM references);
SELECT citations.id, citations.citation_text FROM citations WHERE citations.id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM references);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_citations FROM citations UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_references FROM references;
SELECT paper_id, COUNT(*) AS citation_count FROM citations GROUP BY paper_id HAVING citation_count > 5;
SELECT paper_id, AVG(citations.id) AS avg_citation_id FROM citations GROUP BY paper_id HAVING AVG(citations.id) > 10;
SELECT paper_id, MIN(citations.citation_date) AS first_citation_date FROM citations GROUP BY paper_id ORDER BY first_citation_date;
SELECT paper_id, MAX(citations.citation_date) AS latest_citation_date FROM citations GROUP BY paper_id ORDER BY latest_citation_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT citations.paper_id, COUNT(*) AS total_citations FROM citations WHERE citation_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY citations.paper_id HAVING total_citations > 2;
SELECT references.paper_id, COUNT(*) AS total_references FROM references JOIN citations ON references.paper_id = citations.paper_id GROUP BY references.paper_id HAVING total_references > 1;

SELECT citations.paper_id, COUNT(*) AS citation_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM references WHERE references.paper_id = citations.paper_id) AS reference_count FROM citations GROUP BY citations.paper_id HAVING citation_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM citations;
SELECT citation_text FROM citations;
SELECT * FROM papers;
SELECT title, author FROM papers;
SELECT * FROM references;
SELECT paper_id, cited_paper_id FROM references;
SELECT citations.citation_text, papers.title FROM citations JOIN papers ON citations.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id;
SELECT papers.title, papers.author, references.cited_paper_id FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id;
SELECT papers.*, references.cited_paper_id FROM papers LEFT JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id;
SELECT citations.*, papers.title, references.reference_id FROM citations LEFT JOIN papers ON citations.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id LEFT JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT citation_text FROM citations WHERE cited_paper_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM papers WHERE author = 'John Smith';
SELECT title FROM papers WHERE publish_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM references WHERE paper_id = 5;
SELECT paper_id, cited_paper_id FROM references WHERE reference_id = 10;
SELECT citations.citation_text, papers.title FROM citations JOIN papers ON citations.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id WHERE citations.id = 2;
SELECT papers.title, papers.author, references.cited_paper_id FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id WHERE papers.author = 'Alice Johnson';
SELECT papers.*, references.cited_paper_id FROM papers LEFT JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id WHERE references.reference_id = 8;

SELECT citations.*, papers.title, references.reference_id FROM citations LEFT JOIN papers ON citations.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id LEFT JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id WHERE citations.id = 3;
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE cited_paper_id IN (SELECT paper_id FROM papers WHERE author='John Doe')
SELECT DISTINCT author, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.cited_paper_id GROUP BY author
SELECT * FROM citations JOIN papers ON citations.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id WHERE papers.author='Jane Smith' ORDER BY citations.citation_text DESC
SELECT papers.title, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY papers.title HAVING num_citations > 5
SELECT papers.title, papers.author, citations.citation_text FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id JOIN citations ON references.cited_paper_id = citations.id
SELECT papers.author, COUNT(*) AS num_references FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY papers.author ORDER BY num_references DESC
SELECT * FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%machine learning%' AND cited_paper_id IN (SELECT paper_id FROM papers WHERE publish_date > '2020-01-01')
SELECT author, MAX(publish_date) AS latest_publish_date FROM papers GROUP BY author
SELECT papers.title, COUNT(*) AS num_references FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY papers.title ORDER BY num_references DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_papers FROM papers GROUP BY author HAVING num_papers > 3
SELECT papers.title, papers.author, citations.citation_text, papers.publish_date FROM papers JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.cited_paper_id
SELECT papers.title, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY papers.title ORDER BY num_citations DESC

SELECT papers.title, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id WHERE references.cited_paper_id IN (SELECT id FROM citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%deep learning%') GROUP BY papers.title
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.cited_paper_id GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_citations DESC

SELECT papers.title, papers.author, citations.citation_text, papers.publish_date FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id JOIN citations ON references.cited_paper_id = citations.id ORDER BY papers.publish_date DESC
SELECT author, AVG(publish_date) AS avg_publish_date FROM papers GROUP BY author
SELECT DISTINCT author, COUNT(*) AS num_references FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY author HAVING num_references > 4

SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.cited_paper_id WHERE citations.citation_text LIKE '%data science%' GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_citations DESC
SELECT title, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id WHERE papers.author='John Doe' GROUP BY title ORDER BY num_citations DESC
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS num_papers FROM papers JOIN references ON papers.paper_id = references.paper_id GROUP BY author ORDER BY num_papers DESC
SELECT * FROM Citations;
SELECT citation_id, paper_title, author_name, publication_year FROM Citations;
SELECT paper_title FROM Citations WHERE publication_year = 2021;
SELECT * FROM References;
SELECT referenced_paper_title FROM References WHERE citing_paper_title = 'Example Paper';
SELECT * FROM Authors;
SELECT author_name FROM Authors WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM Venues;
SELECT venue_name, publication_year FROM Venues WHERE publication_year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM Citations JOIN Authors ON Citations.author_name = Authors.author_name;
SELECT * FROM Citations LEFT JOIN References ON Citations.citation_id = References.reference_id;
SELECT * FROM Authors INNER JOIN Venues ON Authors.affiliation = Venues.venue_name;
SELECT author_name, paper_title FROM Citations WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM Citations ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_citations FROM Citations;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_citations FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, publication_year, COUNT(*) AS total_citations FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name, publication_year;
SELECT author_name, SUM(publication_year) AS total_publication_year FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, AVG(publication_year) AS average_publication_year FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, MAX(publication_year) AS max_publication_year FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE publication_year > 2010;
SELECT paper_title, author_name FROM Citations WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020;
SELECT citation_id, paper_title, publication_year FROM Citations WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Citations INNER JOIN Authors ON Citations.author_name = Authors.author_name;
SELECT citation_id, paper_title, venue_name FROM Citations JOIN Venues ON Citations.publication_year = Venues.publication_year;
SELECT citing_paper_title, cited_paper_title FROM References;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM Authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE publication_year > 2010 AND author_name = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT author_name, publication_year FROM Citations JOIN Authors ON Citations.author_name = Authors.author_name WHERE Authors.affiliation = 'University X';
SELECT * FROM Authors WHERE affiliation = 'Company Y' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE Authors.author_name = Citations.author_name);
SELECT cited_paper_title, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM References GROUP BY cited_paper_title ORDER BY num_citations DESC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM Citations JOIN Authors ON Citations.author_name = Authors.author_name GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT paper_title, author_name, publication_year FROM Citations WHERE author_name IN (SELECT author_name FROM Authors WHERE affiliation = 'University Z');
SELECT author_name, CITEOUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY num_citations DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM Authors UNION SELECT author_name, 'No affiliation' AS affiliation FROM Citations WHERE author_name NOT IN (SELECT author_name FROM Authors);
SELECT paper_title, author_name FROM Citations WHERE EXISTS (SELECT * FROM References WHERE References.cited_paper_title = Citations.paper_title);
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS num_citations FROM Citations GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) = (SELECT MAX(COUNT(*)) FROM Citations);
SELECT author_name, publication_year FROM Citations JOIN Authors ON Citations.author_name = Authors.author_name WHERE publication_year < (SELECT MIN(publication_year) FROM Venues);
SELECT paper_title, author_name FROM Citations WHERE publication_year = (SELECT MAX(publication_year) FROM Citations);
SELECT * FROM citations;
SELECT author_name, publication_date FROM citations;
SELECT id, citation_text FROM citations;
SELECT * FROM references;
SELECT ref_id, reference_text FROM references;
SELECT * FROM papers;
SELECT paper_id, title FROM papers;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_id, affiliation FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM citation_links;
SELECT citation_id, ref_id FROM citation_links;
SELECT citations.author_name, references.reference_text FROM citations JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;
SELECT authors.author_name, papers.title FROM authors JOIN papers ON authors.author_id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT citations.id, citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM citations JOIN citation_links ON citations.id = citation_links.citation_id JOIN references ON citation_links.ref_id = references.ref_id;
SELECT citations.author_name, citations.publication_date, authors.affiliation FROM citations JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name;
SELECT papers.title, papers.abstract, papers.publication_date, citation_links.citation_id FROM papers JOIN citation_links ON papers.paper_id = citation_links.citation_id;
SELECT papers.title, authors.author_name FROM papers JOIN authors ON papers.title = authors.author_name;

SELECT citations.id, citations.publication_date, citation_links.ref_id, references.reference_text FROM citations JOIN citation_links ON citations.id = citation_links.citation_id JOIN references ON citation_links.ref_id = references.ref_id;
SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, papers.title, papers.abstract FROM authors JOIN papers ON authors.author_id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT citations.author_name, citations.publication_date, references.ref_id, references.reference_text FROM citations JOIN citation_links ON citations.id = citation_links.citation_id JOIN references ON citation_links.ref_id = references.ref_id;
SELECT * FROM citations JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name;
SELECT citations.id, citations.author_name, citations.publication_date, authors.affiliation FROM citations LEFT JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name;
SELECT papers.title, papers.abstract, citations.citation_text FROM papers INNER JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.id;
SELECT papers.title, citations.citation_text, authors.author_name FROM papers INNER JOIN citations ON papers.paper_id = citations.id INNER JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name;
SELECT citations.id, citations.author_name, citations.publication_date, references.reference_text FROM citations LEFT JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;
SELECT authors.author_name, papers.title, papers.publication_date FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT citations.citation_text, references.reference_text, papers.title FROM citations INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id INNER JOIN papers ON references.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;

SELECT citations.id, authors.author_name, citations.citation_text, papers.title FROM citations LEFT JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name LEFT JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, papers.title, papers.abstract FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id;
SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, citations.citation_text, citations.publication_date FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name;

SELECT citations.id, papers.title, citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM citations INNER JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, papers.title, citations.publication_date, references.reference_text FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id INNER JOIN papers ON references.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT citations.id, citations.author_name, papers.title, papers.publication_date, references.reference_text FROM citations LEFT JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id LEFT JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;

SELECT citations.id, authors.author_name, citations.citation_text, papers.title FROM citations LEFT JOIN authors ON citations.author_name = authors.author_name LEFT JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, papers.title, papers.abstract FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id;
SELECT authors.author_name, authors.affiliation, citations.citation_text, citations.publication_date FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name;

SELECT citations.id, papers.title, citations.citation_text, references.reference_text FROM citations INNER JOIN papers ON citations.id = papers.paper_id INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id;

SELECT authors.author_name, papers.title, citations.publication_date, references.reference_text FROM authors INNER JOIN citations ON authors.author_name = citations.author_name INNER JOIN references ON citations.id = references.cited_paper_id INNER JOIN papers ON references.cited_paper_id = papers.paper_id;
